fr.gouv.vitam.tools.mailextract.thundermbox

Class ThunderMboxStore

  • java.lang.Object
    • javax.mail.Service
      • javax.mail.Store
        • fr.gouv.vitam.tools.mailextract.thundermbox.ThunderMboxStore

  • public class ThunderMboxStore
extends javax.mail.Store
    This class provides access to a Thunderbird message store.

    Applications that need to make use of specific features may cast a Store object to an ThunderMBoxStore object and use the methods on this class.

    WARNING: The APIs unique to this class should be considered EXPERIMENTAL. They may be changed in the future in ways that are incompatible with applications using the current APIs.

    • Constructor Detail

      • ThunderMboxStore

        public ThunderMboxStore(javax.mail.Session session,
                        javax.mail.URLName url)
        Constructor.
        Parameters:
        session - the session
        url - the url url formed as protocol://user@host/dir
        • user is the user (declarative only, not mandatory and not used in processing)
        • host for now only localhost
        • dir is the directory where is the thunderbird mbox hierarchy (default current directory)
          • ex: /home/me/.thunderbird/hag0y625.default/ImapMail/localhost

                                  java.lang.String user,

        Override this service method to implement specific check, including url defined directory availability (not in params)

        port - not used
        user - the user declarative only, not used in processing
        passwd - not used
        Returns:
        true, if successful
